class.name: LinearSolverCholLDL

javadoc.text:
* Using the decomposition, finds the value of 'X' in the linear equation below:
* A*x = b
* where A has dimension of n by n, x and b are n by m dimension. *

*

* *Note* that 'b' and 'x' can be the same matrix instance. *
javadoc.param: B A matrix that is n by m. Not modified.
X An n by m matrix where the solution is writen to. Modified.

javadoc.text: Used internally to find the solution to a single column vector.

method.name: solveInternal
method.comment: solve L*s=b storing y in x

javadoc.text: Sets the matrix 'inv' equal to the inverse of the matrix that was decomposed.
javadoc.param: inv Where the value of the inverse will be stored. Modified.
